edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.asymmetricCrypto.encryption

Class ElGamalParameterSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.asymmetricCrypto.encryption.ElGamalParameterSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec

    public class ElGamalParameterSpec
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec
    Parameter for ElGamal initialization. ElGamal relies on DlogGroup and it's initialization parameters contains the parameters for the dlog's initialization.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
